value.excerpt: DATEADD is a really useful function to create sets of dates backwords or forward from a point in time. It is used for Previous date calculations. value.title: DAX Fridays! #183: How to deal with multiple dates in Power BI
value.excerpt: So you have order date, shipped date, required date....and only one calendar. How do you manage that in power bi and DAX? value.title: DAX fridays! #19: DIVIDE
value.excerpt: Let's go through DIVIDE() function available in DAX! value.excerpt: In this video we will go through the DAX function TREATAS. value.title: Decompress gzip files using Power BI and get access to @EU_Eurostat data.
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show you how to access Eurostat open data using power bi.  Most data is stored in gzip files and you need to know how to decompress gzip files to be able to get the data. I will show you two methods in this video.  Link to Eurostat data portal: https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/data/database?node_code=demo_gind
